Sentencas: Atmospheric plasma spray is a fast and economical process for deposition of yttria-stabilized zirconia (YSZ) electrolyte for solid oxide fuel cells.
Titulo: Improvement of plasma-sprayed YSZ electrolytes for solid oxide fuel cells by alumina addition

Sentencas: YSZ powders have been used to prepare plasma-sprayed thin ceramic films on the metallic substrate employing plasma spray technology at atmospheric pressure.
Titulo: Improvement of plasma-sprayed YSZ electrolytes for solid oxide fuel cells by alumina addition

Sentencas: Alumina doping was employed to improve the structural characteristics and electrical properties of YSZ.
Titulo: Improvement of plasma-sprayed YSZ electrolytes for solid oxide fuel cells by alumina addition

Sentencas: The effect of alumina addition from 1 to 5 wt.% on the properties of plasma-sprayed YSZ films was investigated.
Titulo: Improvement of plasma-sprayed YSZ electrolytes for solid oxide fuel cells by alumina addition

Sentencas: It was found that the gas permeability of the Al-doped YSZ electrolyte layer reached a level of 8.6 x 10(-7) cm(4) gf(-1) s(-1), which is a necessary value for the practical operation of solid oxide fuel cells.
Titulo: Improvement of plasma-sprayed YSZ electrolytes for solid oxide fuel cells by alumina addition

Sentencas: Alumina doping considerably increased the ionic conductivity of plasma-sprayed YSZ.
Titulo: Improvement of plasma-sprayed YSZ electrolytes for solid oxide fuel cells by alumina addition

Sentencas: The open circuit voltage of the alumina-doped YSZ coating was approximately equal to the theoretical value for dense YSZ material.
Titulo: Improvement of plasma-sprayed YSZ electrolytes for solid oxide fuel cells by alumina addition
